metadata.Title: CVE-2017-18552 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in net/rds/af_rds.c in the Linux kernel before 4.11. There is an out of bounds write and read in the function rds_recv_track_latency.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
